text: aur aap kisi haal mein ho aur min jumla un ahwaal ke, aap kahi se Qurâ€™an padte ho aur jo kaam bhi karte ho,hum ko sab ki qabar rehti hai,jab tum us kaam mein mashghol hote ho aur aap ke rub se koi cheez zarra barabar bhi ghayab nahi,na zameen mein aur na asmaan mein aur na koi cheez us se choti aur na koi cheez badi, magar ye sub kitab mubeen mein hai
